commands.suggest.name: suggest
commands.suggest.options.suggestion.name: suggestion
commands.suggest.options.image.name: image
commands.suggest.options.image.descripti: An image to add to your suggestion. Images currently expire after a couple weeks.
commands.configure.name: configure
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.over:
This form lets you configure the bot for your guild.
Where applicable, clicking items on this form will generate new forms if further configuration is required.
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.sugg: Select where you would like suggestions to be sent to.
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.thre: Should Suggestions have a thread created for discussions?
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.auto: Should threads be archived when a suggestion is resolved?
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.log_: Would you like resolved suggestions to stay in the same message or go to a separate channel?
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.sugg: Is there a queue for suggestions?
Send them to a channel based queue
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.ping: Should suggestion authors be pinged in created threads upon thread creation?
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.dm_m: Can the bot DM users about events such as new suggestions?
menus.guild_configuration.base_menu.anon: Should moderators be anonymous when resolving suggestions?
menus.guild_configuration.responses.sugg: I'm sorry but suggestions channel cannot be empty. Please try again and select a new channel.
I have set this guilds suggestion channel to $CHANNEL.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.thre: I have enabled thread creation on new suggestions for this guild.
I have disabled thread creation on new suggestions for this guild.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.auto: Automatically created threads for suggestions will now be archived upon suggestion resolution.
Automatically created threads for suggestions will no longer be archived upon suggestion resolution.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.can_: I have enabled anonymous suggestions for this guild.
I have disabled anonymous suggestions for this guild.
All new suggestions can include images.
All new suggestions cannot include images.
commands.approve.name: approve
commands.approve.options.suggestion.id: The sID you wish to approve
commands.approve.options.response.name: response
commands.approve.options.response.descri: An optional response to add to the suggestion
commands.reject.name: reject
commands.reject.options.suggestion.id: The sID you wish to reject
commands.reject.options.response.name: response
commands.reject.options.response.descrip: An optional response to add to the suggestion
commands.clear.name: clear
commands.clear.description: Remove a suggestion and any associated messages.
commands.clear.options.suggestion.id: The sID you wish to clear
commands.clear.options.response.name: response
commands.clear.options.response.descript: An optional response to add to the suggestion
commands.stats.name: stats
commands.info.name: info
commands.info.options.support.name: support
commands.info.options.support.descriptio: Set this to receive info relevant to receiving official support.
commands.ping.name: ping
values.suggestion_up_vote_no_more_castin: You can no longer cast votes on this suggestion.
values.suggestion_up_vote_already_voted: You have already up voted this suggestion.
values.suggestion_up_vote_modified_vote:
I have changed your vote from a down vote to an up vote for this suggestion.
The suggestion will be updated shortly.
values.suggestion_up_vote_registered_vot:
Thanks!
I have registered your up vote.
values.suggestion_down_vote_no_more_cast: You can no longer cast votes on this suggestion.
values.suggestion_down_vote_already_vote: You have already down voted this suggestion.
values.suggestion_down_vote_modified_vot:
I have changed your vote from an up vote to a down vote for this suggestion.
The suggestion will be updated shortly.
values.suggestion_down_vote_registered_v:
Thanks!
I have registered your down vote.
values.display_data_old_suggestion_type: Suggestions using reactions are not supported by this command.
values.display_data_no_voters: There are no voters to show you for this.
values.suggest_suggestion_sent:
Hey, {}. Your suggestion has been sent to {} to be voted on!

Please wait until it gets approved or rejected by a staff member.

Your suggestion ID (sID) for reference is **{}**.
errors.suggest.content_too_long.title: Command Failed
errors.suggest.content_too_long.descript:
Your content was too long, please limit it to $MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH characters or less.

I have attached a file containing your content to save rewriting it entirely.
values.suggest.sent_to_queue: Your suggestion has been sent to the queue for processing.
values.suggest.no_anonymous_suggestions: Your guild does not allow anonymous suggestions.
values.suggest.no_images_in_suggestions: Your guild does not allow images in suggestions.
values.suggest_ping_author_in_thread: Hey <@$AUTHOR_ID>, I have created this thread for you to discuss your suggestion in.
values.suggestion_object_lock_thread: Locking this thread as the suggestion has reached a resolution.
values.config_logs_message: I have set this guilds log channel to {}
values.config_get_partial_dm_responses_m: Dm responses: I {} DM users on actions such as suggest
values.config_get_partial_threads_messag: I {} create threads for new suggestions
values.config_get_keep_logs_set: Suggestion logs will be kept in your suggestions channel.
values.config_get_keep_logs_not_set: Suggestion logs will be kept in your logs channel.
values.config_get_auto_archive_threads_m: I {} automatically archive threads created for suggestions.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.dm_m: I have enabled DM messages for this guild.
I have disabled DM messages for this guild.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.ping: I have enabled pings on new suggestion threads for this guild.
I have disabled pings on new suggestion threads for this guild.
values.config_keeplogs_enable_message: Suggestions will now stay in your suggestions channel instead of going to logs.
values.config_keeplogs_disable_message: Suggestions will now be moved to your logs channel when finished.
values.config_suggestions_queue_enable_m: All new suggestions will be sent to your suggestions queue.
values.config_suggestions_queue_disable_: All new suggestions will be sent directly to your suggestions channel.
menus.guild_configuration.responses.anon: All further suggestions will not show the moderator who resolved them.
All further suggestions will show the moderator who resolved them.
values.config_get_anonymous_resolution_n: Suggesters are shown who resolved their suggestions.
values.config_get_anonymous_resolution_s: Suggesters are not shown who resolved their suggestions.
values.pagination_session_expired: This pagination session has expired, please start a new one with `/queue view`
values.pagination_queue_cancelled: I have cancelled this queue for you.
values.pagination_queue_accepted: I have accepted that suggestion from the queue.
values.pagination_queue_rejected: I have removed that suggestion from the queue.
values.queue_view_nothing_queued: Your guild has no suggestions in the queue.
values.queue_view_prior_queue: These suggestions were queued before your guild disabled the suggestions queue.
values.queue_user_rejected: Your queued suggestion was rejected. For your reference, I have included the rejected suggestion below.
values.config_get_images_in_suggestions_: This guild {} have images in suggestions.
USER_BLOCKLIST_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Remove a users ability to create suggestions.
USER_BLOCKLIST_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Re-add a users ability to create suggestions.
SUGGESTION_ID_DESCRIPTION: The suggestions ID you wish to reference.
values.note_change_made_description:
A moderator has modified a note on your suggestion.

You can review the note (or lack thereof) here: $JUMP
values.note_response: Your change has been made to the suggestion.
commands.notes.name: note
NOTES_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Add a note to an existing suggestion.
NOTES_ADD_ARG_SUGGESTION_ID_DESCRIPTION: The sID you wish to add a note to
NOTES_ADD_ARG_NOTE_DESCRIPTION: The note you wish to add
NOTES_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a note from a suggestion
NOTES_REMOVE_ARG_SUGGESTION_ID_DESCRIPTI: The sID you wish to remove a note from
values.config_get_uses_physical_queue_se: This guild uses a channel based suggestions queue.
values.config_get_uses_physical_queue_no: This guild uses a virtual suggestions queue.
values.config_get_uses_thread_pings_set: This guild pings users in threads created for suggestions.
values.config_get_uses_thread_pings_not_: This guild does not ping users in threads created for suggestions.
values.config_use_physical_queue_enable_: If the suggestions queue is enabled, all new suggestions will go to a channel queue.
values.config_use_physical_queue_disable: If the suggestions queue is enabled, all new suggestions will go to a virtual queue.
values.config_queue_channel_message: I have set this guilds suggestion queue channel to $CHANNEL
values.config_queue_log_channel_message: I have set this guilds suggestion queue channel to {}
values.config_queue_channel_message_remo: I have disabled sending rejected queue suggestions to a channel.
values.queue_already_resolved: This queued suggestion has already been resolved.
errors.suggest.missing_queue_channel.des:
This command requires a queue channel to use.
Please contact an administrator and ask them to set one up using the following command.
`/config queue_channel`
errors.suggest.queue_channel_not_found.d:
The bot does not have permissions to interact with the queue channel.
Please contact an administrator and ask them to ensure the channel exists and that the bot can see it.
